title: Chuang Tang Tu 2 Fengkuang Maxi Tuan
synopsis: In the peaceful and peaceful town of Chuangtang, a wonderful circus performance has just been staged. Unexpectedly, a rabbit that fell from the sky crashed the place. This bunny is the curious rabbit. Tangtang wanted to explain to the clown coral in the circus that he didn't intend to sabotage, but the clown wanted to take Brother Rabbit as punishment. At this dangerous juncture, the dignified opponent, the kitchen knife dog, appeared in time and saved Brother Rabbit, and a farce ended. In the fight with Clown Coral, Cai Knife vaguely discovered her secret. To find out, Cai Knife decided to go deep into the circus. In the underground of the circus, a crazy conspiracy was gradually uncovered by the chopper dog. On the other hand, Tangtang and his friends were enjoying the wonderful circus performance, and did not realize that a crazy crisis was coming. 　　What kind of crazy conspiracy is hidden in the crazy circus? Can Chopper Dog spread the news? How did Tangtang and his friends usher in a crazy battle? (translated from douban)

Sequel.name: Chuang Tang Tu 3 Jiong Jiong Shiguang Ji
